page.title: 12CLOTHES(MALE)
page.content: MALE CLOTHING TODAY HAS CHANGED DRAMATICALY OVER THE YEARS.TODAY MALES WEAR CLOTHES WITH LABELS ON THEM FOR INSTANCE "SERGIO TACCHINI","LACOSTE", "FILA","ELLESSE","CERRUTI","KAPPA"AND "DIADORA",THESE ARE JUST A FEW EXAMPLES OF SOME OF THE LABELLED CLOTHES.PEOPLE ARE PREPARED TO PAY PRICES LIKE 30.00 POUNDS FOR A TEE-SHIRT,OR 35.00 POUNDS. THIS OF COURSE IS THE LATEST FASHION. THIS FASHION IS CALLLED"CASUAL".THESE COMPANIES MAKE ALL SORTS OF CLOTHES. EXAMPLES;"FILA"AS WELL AS MAKING TEE- SHIRTS THEY ALSO MAKE TRAINERS,SOCKS, SWEAT-BANDS,TROUSERS AND SHORTS.SOME OF THESE COMPANIES HAVE BEEN GOING FOR MANY YEARS,LIKE"LACOSTE"AND"CERRUTI" WHICH HAS BEEN ESTABLISHED SINCE 1881 AND IS STILL GOING STRONG.IT HAS ONLY JUST BECOME POPULAR WITH CASUALS IN THE 1980Â£S.
